title: Sources: Yanks get Fried for $218M, record for LHP
description: Max Fried and the Yankees agreed to an eight-year, $218 million contract, sources told ESPN on Tuesday, the largest guarantee for a left-handed pitcher.
author: Jeff Passan

title: QB Burrow's home broken into during MNF
description: Bengals quarterback Joe Burrow's home was broken into during Monday night's game against the Cowboys in the latest home burglary of a pro athlete in the U.S.

title: 'They have to be favourites' - Liverpool 'perfect' in Champions League
description: Six wins out of six and "one of the world's best keepers" returning to the starting XI - are Liverpool favourites to win the Champions League?

title: 'I love the competition' - Duran sends 'message' with Villa stunner
description: Jhon Duran continues to make his case to be Aston Villa's starting striker with a stunning strike in their 3-2 away win over RP Leipzig in the Champions League.

title: 4 thoughts on the NBA Cup, including predictions for the winner
description: The knockout stage has arrived, with one-and-done fates hanging over the eight remaining teams in the quarterfinals and beyond. Our NBA experts weigh in.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Reports: Michigan set to hire North Carolina's Chip Lindsey as new offensive coordinator
description: Lindsey has been at North Carolina for the past two seasons.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Carra: It couldn't have gone much worse for INEOS at Man Utd
description: Manchester United's new part-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe has had a "poor start" at Old Trafford, according to Sky Sports pundit Jamie Carragher.

title: Sainz tests Williams as four drivers make team debuts in F1 2025 taster
description: Carlos Sainz was among four drivers who made testing debuts for their new teams for F1 2025 as the end-of-season Abu Dhabi test wrapped up this year's track action on Tuesday.
